modals.feedbackDescription: Provide detailed feedback on the student's skill

updateStarRating.title: Update stars rating
updateStarRating.description: Provide feedback explaining why you updated your rating; keep in mind the new rating is temporary until a teacher endorses it.
updateStarRating.ratingToLow: Your new rating is lower than the current rating

addFeedback.title: Add feedback
addFeedback.description: Provide examples, strengths, areas for improvement, and suggestions to reflect on and improve your skills

requestEndorsement.fromEmaildescription: Enter the work email of the person who will write the endorsement.

requestEndorsement.workEmailDescription: An email will be sent with a link to your skill. This link will work only once.

requestFeedback.fromUserdescription: Ask {name} for feedback on a specific skill.

endorsementRequest.title: Endorsment request

endorsementRequest.skillRatingDescription: Rate the skill from 1 to 4 stars
